constraints Package¶

Description¶

Store information about various types of constraints, and generate the corresponding Z3 input.

BracketedConstraint Module¶

Created on Apr 29, 2013

@author: ezulkosk

class constraints.BracketedConstraint.BracketedConstraint(comment, stringValue=None, value=None)¶

Bases: constraints.Constraint.Constraint

Variables:
  • stack – ([Z3_expression]) Used to process a tree of expressionts.
  • stringStack – ([str]) Used to display/debug expressions.
  • stringValue – (str) The final string representation of the constraint.
  • value – (Z3_expression) The final Z3_expression representation of the constraint.

Class for creating bracketed Clafer constraints in Z3.

Parameters:
  • comment (str) – Description of constraint for debugging purposes.
  • stringValue (str (o)) – More technical description of the constraint, essentially the string representially of the Z3 constraint.
  • value (Z3_expression (o)) – The Z3_expression that will be passed to the solver.
addArg(arg)¶

TODO

addOperator(operation)¶
Parameters:operation (str) – The expression operator in Clafer syntax.

Gets operator arity, pops off that number of elements from stack and stringStack. Places Z3-operator and args onto stringStack in string form, and onto stack in Z3_expression form.

endProcessing()¶

When a constraint is finished processing, its final representation is the only thing left on the stacks. Stores these values in stringValue and value.

CardinalityConstraint Module¶

Created on May 1, 2013

@author: ezulkosk

class constraints.CardinalityConstraint.CardinalityConstraint(claferSort, card)¶

Bases: constraints.Constraint.Constraint

Variables:
  • claferSort – (ClaferSort) The Sort that will be constrained.
  • lower – (int) The lower cardinality bound.
  • upper – (int) The upper cardinality bound.

Creates very simple cardinality constraints for each clafer I suspect this will probably need to change in the future

Parameters:
  • claferSort (ClaferSort) – ClaferSort for a given Clafer object from AST
  • card (IntegerLiteral, IntegerLiteral) – contains the lower and upper bounds, stored in lower and upper

Constraint Module¶

Created on May 1, 2013

@author: ezulkosk

class constraints.Constraint.Constraint¶

Bases: builtins.object

Abstract superclass for all constraints

comment¶
Returns:str – Used for debugging constraints.
generateConstraint()¶

Creates the Z3 constraint to be handled by the solver.

stringValue¶
Returns:str – Contains the string representation of the constraint.
value¶
Returns:str – The actual z3 constraint passed to the solver.
